remarks.format: ## Remarks [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]資料繫結模型可讓您將與物件。The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] data binding model enables you to associate with a object. 類別是內建規則會檢查繫結來源屬性更新期間所擲回的例外狀況。The class is a built-in rule that checks for exceptions that are thrown during the updates of the binding source property. 您可以提供自訂邏輯以指定繫結引擎如何處理這些例外狀況使用。You can provide custom logic to specify how the binding engine handles these exceptions by using a . 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see . 若要設定替代語法明確設定為屬性`true`上您或物件。An alternative syntax to setting the explicitly is to set the property to `true` on your or object. 您可以建立自訂規則建立的類別，衍生自。You can create a custom rule by creating a class that derives from . 如需詳細資訊和資料驗證的詳細的討論，請參閱[資料繫結概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-overview.md)。For more information and a detailed discussion of data validation, see [Data Binding Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-overview.md). ## Examples 屬性採用一個集合物件。The property takes a collection of objects. 下列範例會使用為繫結目標屬性和`StartPrice`（整數） 為繫結來源屬性。The following example uses as the binding target property and `StartPrice` (an integer) as the binding source property. 當使用者輸入的值無法轉換成整數時，會擲回例外狀況，這會導致要使其失效的目標值。When the user enters a value that cannot be converted to an integer, an exception is thrown, which causes the to invalidate the target value. [!code-xaml[DataBindingLab#DefaultValidation](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DataBindingLab/CSharp/AddProductWindow.xaml#defaultvalidation)] 根據預設，當沒有驗證錯誤時，出現紅色框線。By default, when there is a validation error, the appears with a red border. （選擇性） 您可以撰寫自訂，指定您要如何驗證錯誤時通知使用者。Optionally, you can write a custom to specify how you want to notify the user when there is a validation error. 如需詳細資料驗證的詳細資訊，請參閱[資料繫結概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-overview.md)。For more information about data validation, see [Data Binding Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-overview.md). 如需完整範例，請參閱[資料繫結示範](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=163703)。For the complete sample, see [Data Binding Demo](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=163703).
